name: Summon Storm Atronach
description: Summon an immobile storm atronach at the target location. Its arrival deals 2249 Shock Damage and stuns enemies for 3 seconds. The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing 1124 Shock Damage every 1 second.  An ally near the atronach can activate the Charged Lightning synergy, granting the ally and the atronach Major Berserk, increasing their damage done by 10% for 8 seconds.

The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing $2 Shock Damage every 1 second.
